titleStmt.title: The magistrates charge, for the peoples safetie. Laid open in a sermon, preached before the right Honorable House of Peeres, in the Abbey Church at Westminster, at their late solemne monthly fast, May 26. 1647. / By William Hussey, Minister at Chesilhurst in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Hussey, William, minister of Chiselhurst.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper, for Iohn Saywell, and are to be sold at his shop in Little Britaine, at the signe of the Greyhound,

notesStmt.note: Order to print on verso of first leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Little Britaine, at the signe of the Greyhound
